info.name: Facebook Dark (Blue)
info.description: Ever wanted to use a darker Facebook? I always wanted to have a darker Facebook but since nobody has ever created a good one I decided to create one by myself. I dedicate this theme to Hackers and Programmers since most of them love Dark Mode. Hope you use it,like it and share this theme with your friends/co-workers. Important note: This theme is not complete. However, I'm still improving it everyday. :) Thanks for using this theme. Made with ♥ by ffcf
info.additionalInfo:
Created by a 15 year old geek :D
Last updated: 2nd November 2016
